title: 4/5/17 - Full Show
description:
Susan Rice under fire "I leaked nothing to nobody" ...Media under hands her softballs ..."Proof positive that the media is in on the game" ...North Korean defector says the 'world should be ready' ...Alec Baldwin's new book?...From the John Kerry audio vault? ...Conspiracy Hero to the Left, tells us what Trump will do to maintain control? ...Maniac Alex Jones flies off the handle once again

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
